item.title: container runtime and async programming overview
item.description: The objective of this document is list out the important topic as discussed in weekly tech sessioin. What is a container ? A container is runtime environment that manages life cycle of web components and provides other services.

item.title: Distributed system
item.description: A distributed system is a system whose components are located on different networked computers, which communicate and coordinate their actions by passing messages to one another. The components interact with one another in order to achieve a common goal.

item.title: Today I learned
item.description: The objective of this post is to keep track of learning I do each day. This is part of my new year resolution to learn things in a better and effective way.

item.title: Cloud native attitude
item.description: The objective of this document is list out the use cases, resources to understand the application architecture, behaviour, use cases when migrating to cloud. resources url https://container-solutions.com/

item.title: Spring security short note
item.description: Spring security configuration can be found in the below listed urls. https://spring.io/guides/gs/securing-web/ https://docs.spring.io/spring-security/site/docs/current/guides/html5/helloworld-boot.html https://dzone.com/articles/spring-security-4-authenticate-and-authorize-users https://www.boraji.com/spring-security-5-jdbc-based-authentication-example https://spring.io/guides/topicals/spring-security-architecture/

item.title: Design Patterns Short notes
item.description: What is Design pattern Instead of defining what is design pattern lets define what we mean by design and what we mean by pattern. Design is blue print or sketch of something so it can be defined as creation of something in mind.

item.title: Hugo with asciidoc steps
item.description: Install Hugo https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/#windows install ruby and gem. install asciidoc and asciidoctor gem install asciidoc gem install asciidoctor

item.title: First Post
item.description: Hello Hugo world! No more excuses for having no blog or documentation now!
